title: All for one
body:
And cancer for all.

Next time you do a One For All game mode, please think about permanently banning some champions, like Heimer and whoever else is just cancer to that mode.

I just played as 5 dongers and as much as it gave me quite a good laugh, we went against Poppy, it is not really a good idea to let that happen and you can't expect everyone to ban Heimer in every game you play.

19 minutes in we made our way to Baron, dropped 15 turrets and just sat there while watching 4 Poppy, our turrets got Baren, we got 4 poppy and game over, no dongers were killed in the making.

I know it is supposed to be a fun mode, but that game ruined the fun for the enemy, every time they attacked, unless they had an ult, they would just die making it only viable to attack once every 1-2 minutes and ended with us just sitting in a 15 turret enclosure at the base of their Nexus.

replies.body: heimerdinger is shit he scales really badly if you can wait 50 minutes you win.

was it really bro-annoying-af-sco who concocted this entire amalgamation of thought as to how strong people think heimerdinger can be just because theres a few more turrets on the field? obviously hes gonna do well in the laning phase and maybe a bit after that but if you're playing nearly any of the other op picks you will end up coming out on top. of course in such a lazier game mode people prefer to all in at level 5 and proceed to feed therein causing him to then truly become unstoppable. whats more riskier than 1 poppy is 5 poppys. she takes soooo much longer to really get going, which only makes it worse having 5 of them. she has literally the worst mana issues in the game which is incredibly unlucky against such a lane dominance like donger, or 5 of them
